body_html:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/23250863/difference-between-pthread-and-lpthread-while-compiling

-lpthread and -pthread seem to both be valid, with some stackoverflow sources saying that -pthread is more portable.

I'm not sure if -lpthreads (with the s) is a thing though; that might be the problem with this error edit: this is probably not the problem

body:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/23250863/difference-between-pthread-and-lpthread-while-compiling

`-lpthread` and `-pthread` seem to both be valid, with some stackoverflow sources saying that `-pthread` is more portable.

~~I'm not sure if `-lpthreads` (with the s) is a thing though; that might be the problem with this error~~ edit: this is probably not the problem
